what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Brachial Plexus Injuries ?,The NINDS conducts and supports research on injuries to the nervous system such as brachial plexus injuries. Much of this research is aimed at finding ways to prevent and treat these disorders.,NINDS,Brachial Plexus Injuries
